GSD.description:
xen/netfront: harden netfront against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.222 by commit 3559ca594f15fcd23ed10c0056d40d71e5dab8e5. For more details please see the references link.
